title: Test Output
description: The Test output of the Tekton result is an object that includes the context about the test along with counters for all checks

result.description: The outcome of the testing task, can be `SUCCESS`, `FAILURE`, `WARNING`, `SKIPPED` or `ERROR`

namespace.description: Optional, the rego namespace of the test policy

timestamp.description: An UNIX epoch timestamp of the test completion time

successes.description: The number of successful checks in the form of an integer

note.description: Optional, a short note to provide additional information about the test

failures.description: The number of failed checks in the form of an integer

warnings.description: The number of warning checks in the form of an integer
